attributes.action: stop the excessive and obscene bonus payouts within British banks which have received recent government financial help.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In any other business extracting money OUT of a business during times of financial loss would be called fraud. Why is the banking bonus culture exempt from normal definitions of fraud?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
